name: Observers (itch)
description:
Do you think you know your friends ? Do you think you know the person sitting next to you ? Think again.

Controls and How to play

This game is multiplayer and needs two controllers.

Questions will be asked to both players.

If you are the player for whom the controller is vibrating and the chair on the screen is noised, then you have to choose your own answer.

If you are the other player (no vibrations and no noise on your chair), then try to guess the other player's answer.

Questions will be asked twice to switch roles.

Prepare to be disappointed !
